nodes.text: Dassid Whateel was a male political analyst of the Galactic Senate and a commentator for HoloNet News, on the morning talk-show Amberdawn, shortly before the outbreak of the Clone Wars. Whateel was interviewed by HoloNet News following the appointment of Senator Onaconda Farr to the Loyalist Committee, a move which he claimed not to be surprising as Farr was the "perfect image of a loyalist."
